website_summaries.verdict: With a flexible lens in a pocketable package, the Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS1 is a pleasing point-and-shoot megazoom--both in design and photo quality.

customer_reviews.title: Refurb but not working
customer_reviews.text: I bought it refurbished expecting everything had been checked out. Optical zoom is non functional. Although return postage (UPS) is covered by the seller "Pick Up" is not. I can't find a UPS store that is open with the COVID issues so will do my best.
customer_reviews.author: KMVK

customer_reviews.title: I have no idea why all manufacturers insist on NOT maintaining such a useful and practical feature in other models
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the VERY few cameras on the market that has a voice memo feature. For each photo taken, you have 10 seconds of audio recording, right after taking the photo, to describe what you've just taken a picture of. Another one that has it is the FujiFilm FinePix S9000, with up to 30 seconds of audio recording for each image. In both cases, the audio file takes the same sequence number as the photo it is attached to. I have no idea why all manufacturers insist on NOT maintaining such a useful and practical feature in other models. To me, it is extremely useful and I use it all the time, during my travels.
customer_reviews.author: LUIZ C RODRIGUES

customer_reviews.title: Good camera with overly complex features
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice camera for the price. It takes okay photos, better than other similar cameras I've seen. My only problem with it is its complexity. It is not an easy camera to learn to use properly. Some of the instruction booklet is difficult for an older, technically chalenged person to understand, yet there are issues that I've had with the camera that seem simple but are not addressed in the book. Also, because of the delay in the shutter, this is not a good camera for action photos or catching a momentary occurance. That said, it's better than what other similar cameras seem.
customer_reviews.author: Dave S.

customer_reviews.title: Am a novice and I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I am a rookie...I just take the camera and click the button...thats all I can do...I dont really understand the complex settings...This camera has proved awesome for me so far...I just shift one button and it goes into video mode...The picture quality is great...both inside and outside...kind of okish during night and in low light...but I have been using it only in the auto setting...maybe I can change around some settings to get better pictures in low light...Also it looks really pretty. I think the battery life is just fine. The video quality just amazed me.Its super awesome...and even the voices are recorded perfectly. Oh I just found out these bunch of auto modes...for landscape, candlelight etc...they are just great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anand

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: Boy! This is one great little camera! Just great! So easy to use, Inteligent Auto mode is simply flawless, couldn't believe how good the pics were! Also all those other modes-you have everything at the tip of your finger-just select and shoot, and don't worry-if there is a way to make a picture-this camera will make it! And then some! Must admit-as a Canon Mark III user I was a little bit..suspicious, to say the least, but now! Man! I'm in awe! I bought it for my wife, but, somehow, now I'm using it more then she, hehehe...Super happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nikola Milasevic

customer_reviews.title: A very good compact camera with good video
customer_reviews.text: I think its picture quality is very good in its class, and the same applies for video recordings. It is a pity that it does not have HD video support. I also have a newer model (ZS5) from Panasonic, which has more pixels, HD video, more features, better LCD, but it is obvious that the picture quality of ZS1 is superior. Even if it is an old model, I am not sure that current models in this class make better pictures. (Of course you shall not compare its picture quality to high end compacts or a DSLR.)
customer_reviews.author: Gyorgy

customer_reviews.title: Quick & Dirty Review
customer_reviews.text: This camera is by far the best digital camera I've ever owned. If you want something that simply WORKS, and WORKS WELL... this is hands down a fantastic option! I'm no professional photographer, far from it... and the fact that this camera lets me take professional-looking photos is phenomenal! Absolutely love it... GREAT bang for buck. Now I'm going to buy one for my wife too... hers will be silver though :).
customer_reviews.author: M. Rogne

customer_reviews.title: Works great after so many years.
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. It's tough and strong, after using it so many years (5 years already) it rocks till now. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Areg

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: We have owned a Panasonic Lumix in the past and loved it. I bought this camera as a gift for my husband, since we have been doing some traveling recently. The options that drew me to this model were the large LCD screen, the 12X optical zoom, the compact size, and the great price. We took it on our last trip and got some great pictures. We are definitely point and shoot people, so the intelligent auto feature is great for us and takes all the work out of picture-taking. Great camera!
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Sinkway

customer_reviews.title: LOVE my Lumix
customer_reviews.text: Perfect camera for those who are not pro photographers but still want to be able to take amazing pics. The presets are fabulous and finally you can take flattering portraits of people that aren't so HD that you see each pore on someones face! Just nice pics, great color and great presets. Plus the size is great. You can take the kind of quality pics you would by bringing a huge Canon or Nikon but this just fits in your bag. Bigger than the Canon elph but not by too much. Also, takes great low light pics. That's a huge plus!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Retruned 1st one, 2nd one works great for my needs
customer_reviews.text: lens cover stuck on the first one, returned it, and am very happy with pic quality and features so far! great wide angle and zoom, excellent clarity though some bright scenes can get washed out, but I don't know the white balance feature very well. Great for my plant class with macro setting! Not super slim or super light, but if it was, it wouldn't be as good! Would definitely buy one again and recommend to friends!
customer_reviews.author: S. Sadler

customer_reviews.title: Love this Camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend. It was really easy to use and the menus are easy to navigate. She is not very tech savvy. Its small enough that she can bring it where ever she goes to catch that embarassing moment that you hope no one saw. Setting up the software on her computer was not difficult either. The Software to download the picture files was easy and clearly laid out. Hope this helps you. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Seppy

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for concert videos!
customer_reviews.text: This camera purchase was the second one we purchased of the same model. We take a lot of videos of rock concerts (see wickmanfam on youtube) and this camera does an excellent job with the audio. Not many cameras can say that when it comes to rock concerts. The camera also has a 12x zoom which aids at getting up close and personal on videos and pictures. we highly recommend the camera. We now go armed with two cameras (same model) to shows, usually use one for pix and one for video.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wickman

customer_reviews.title: Panosonic Lumix camera DMC - ZS1 10 MP 12X optical
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! It is the third such camera I've had. One was ruined by a rogue wave submerging me at the ocean. The second I just wore out after several years. The pictures are always professional quality. I always get better results than I think. I believe it's the Leica glass lens; one of the best in the industry. great value for the money. I will continue to purchase these.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Kirkland, WA USA

customer_reviews.title: Non-standard charging cord
customer_reviews.text: I bought this used, for cheap. I was aware that it didn't come with a charger, but I didn't realized that it is such an older model that it has a custom cord/charger that is hard to find. It doesn't use standard micro-usb charger, but you can order an external battery charger. It takes good photos for the price. I love Panasonic Cameras; I just returned this one for a newer slightly more expensive model.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Gibson

customer_reviews.title: great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Ancester of the Lumix series, this model has been upgraded thru the years. More recent versions (2, 3, 4) now come with fancy features and higher performance level. Still all of my basic needs are covered in terms of usage and, most importantly, quality. I take it with me constantly and use it in a point & shoot mode. At less than $130 i consider it an excellent deal and i congratulate myself everyday. Go find the last copies out there!
customer_reviews.author: Gaston

customer_reviews.title: These cameras are wonderfully easy to use and take great pix
customer_reviews.text: This was bought to replace one that got sand in the works. The first one was successfully cleaned, so this one will be the back-up. These cameras are wonderfully easy to use and take great pix.
customer_reviews.author: James J. Cunningham, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Exc Camera
customer_reviews.text: I have one of this model already and I ordered the same model as a backup and don't expect anything less than the outstanding operation of the original one
customer_reviews.author: Allen C. Windelspecht

customer_reviews.title: panasonic lumix
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic pictures. The camera is light and comfortable to use. After 2 weeks of use the only problem is the ZOOM - the control works too quickly and it is very difficult to get the distance that is right for the situation. I have several times missed a shot because the zoom was too aggressive and I would have to step it down slowly. It probably would be perfect for a sporting event at which all shots would require the same zoom strength, but it is not good for the street photography that is my love.
customer_reviews.author: joanna

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Travel Camera
customer_reviews.text: I use a Sony A700 DSLR for my "serious" stuff, but I love having a good camera small enough to "whip out anywhere" and still get a quality shot. I've used several Lumix cameras over the years and they keep getting better. Loaded with features, like a 12X optical zoom and optical stabilization, this camera will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Powers

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Fast Shipping, and although I have hardly begun to look at all the features I like the IA autofocus as the photos I've already taken are good. The only thing I noticed is that there's a second or two delay before a photo is taken and that can be a problem if you want to capture an image instantly.
customer_reviews.author: soar&fly

customer_reviews.title: If you want optical mag, this is the camera
customer_reviews.text: For a camera in this size range, it's got great optical magnification. Controls get easy for the touch buttons and it has a very (too) comprrehensive optical menu. Nice size vie3wing window but I would also have liked a viewfinder. Overall, a pretty good camera. Not sure whether I'll ever use the video and sound capabilities, but it's there if I so desire.
customer_reviews.author: Ridgeman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera... Great zoom and stabilization when you zoom. Good quality pictures on my Mediterranean trip...
customer_reviews.author: Rob K

customer_reviews.title: I've purchased four of these!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. So great I bought one for each of my three kids and myself! One of our kids took it to Alaska with him and took some great pics. Perfect for travel and a very nice camera for the money.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: stewart
customer_reviews.text: Excellant camera the zoom is spectacular and the steady shot gives very sharp images.The video with the zoom is very effective and still shots from distances are very clear. The colours are brillant. One great camera!!
customer_reviews.author: stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera works like a gem. It focuses quickly, has a long-lasting battery, several scene options, a good flash and easy downloading. Overall it helps the average Joe take great pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Sharp images
customer_reviews.text: This inexpensive point and shoot camera produces sharp image for outdoors photos. Indoors photos are not as good, but I believe it is partly due to my photographic skills.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lin

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Camera, But Get a DSLR If You Have the Budget
customer_reviews.text: Have owned this camera for over a year now. There are newer models of it out now that might be a better overall choice for a super zoom point and shoot. Is very easy to use and the zoom is substantial. However, for those seriously considering photography as a hobby or wanting to take picture taking to the next level, buy a DSLR with detachable lens. I wish now that I had invested the additional 200 or so dollars to do just that.
customer_reviews.author: D. Zerby

customer_reviews.title: A good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I spent a couple of weeks doing the research (reading reviews, asking around) for a new camera and am very happy with this purchase. Great camera. Photo quality is very good. Well made. Easy to use right out of the box, but with good features, too. A good camera for traveling, which is the reason I bought it. Highly recommended in this price/feature range.
customer_reviews.author: pr

customer_reviews.title: Big, but worth the extra weight.
customer_reviews.text: Camera is great, features are awesome (I'm still learning new things every day), but it is a bit large. Not a camera for a woman who wants to carry it around in her purse all the time.
customer_reviews.author: A. Schram

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This product is of high quality for me. I love it I recommend this to everyone for their excellent design
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Romero

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't even read the manuel yet. I've taken some outdoor pictures and pictures of a concert in a jam packed club and they came out great. Even the video I took at the concert came out way better than I expected, with people bumping into me it was impossible to hold the camera steady, and I was surprised that the sound was not distorted like you see in a lot of concert videos. I love the small size, I carry it in a small compartment in my purse every where I go. I recomend buying a second battery for backup if you want to take videos.
customer_reviews.author: Jeneanne Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price !
customer_reviews.text: I have this camera and purchased a second one for my daughter for Christmas. It is easy to use and delivers excellent pictures. Great camera for the price.
customer_reviews.author: kmthome

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came with the wrong charger, no way to charge the battery!
customer_reviews.author: Cari

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic digital camera
customer_reviews.text: Took this camera on a week long motorcycle trip to Monument Valley and the 4 Corners in Utah, Arizona, New Mexico Colorado and Texas. Its so easy to use and the tele-photo was fantastic. The weight of the camera was wonderful, you just carry it in your pocket. Overall the camera is perfect. Amazon has the best prices. Priced this camera at 4 retailers before ordering from Amazon. Shipping was extremely fast had it in less then 5 days.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: COOL
customer_reviews.text: NICE SERVICE, NICE ITEM, ALL GOOD AND RECOMENDABLE!! THEY SHIPPED BEFORE THE DEADLINE AS I ASK CUZ I WAS IN A RUSH.
customer_reviews.author: Engel

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I felt that the camera was an excellent buy. The fact that it has 12x optical zoom and 10 megapixels, and all of that with such small dimensions, it wasn't hard for me to like. Although Panasonic's higher model the ZS3 has significantly more features like HD video capturing, I find that the video quality is sufficient for the day to day things. So unless high definition video is something that you are interested in, I would say that the ZS1 is the camera for you.
customer_reviews.author: Austin K. Itamoto

customer_reviews.title: A great alternate to my iPhone 5
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little camera! If you can get your hands on one, do!
customer_reviews.author: 2bis2cr8

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lost my newest one so back to this old trusty
customer_reviews.author: Marty Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Everything as described. Great camera for the price. Used but it looks and works like its brand new
customer_reviews.author: Intaglio

customer_reviews.title: Serious pocket camera
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many pocket cameras over the last 15 years. When I have serious photographic projects I use a single lens reflex digital camera made by Nikon. For casual use I have tried at least four small pocket cameras but none of them would satisfy. The Panasonic Lumix DMC - CS1 offers features of more expensive SLRs but without the bulk. Even the annoying delay between pressing the shutter key and taking the picture has been minimized in this camera. Don't get me wrong it can't shoot as quickly as a good SLR but for a serious camera that fits in your pocket is unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: Super camera, takes great pictures and has lots of wonderful options. Sturdy enough that you won't drop it either and the lens zooming options are terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer E. Nash

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CAMERA!
customer_reviews.text: this is not the first one of these i have had. they make a very good unit that agrees well with what i do with a camera.
customer_reviews.author: MIDWAY41

customer_reviews.title: love this camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera is very easy to use. The Intellegent Auto feature is awesome. Need a steady hand with the zoom. It is a little bit thicker than other cameras put still small enough to shove in coat pocket or purse.
customer_reviews.author: R. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: one of the best cameras i'v ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: top of the line camera , sharp pictures, easy to use, time will only tell how it holds up? for now I'm haveing a blast!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: James V. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Photo quality
customer_reviews.text: Photo quality Most important is picture quality not higher mega pixel? I wish that panasonic reduce the mega pixel on this camera or use a bigger sensor ZS1 Effective pixels = 10.1 MP Total Pixels = 10.3 MP Sensor Size = 1/2.5 Pixel Density = 41 MP/cm Nice Camera good quality and sharp lens Small sensor 1/2.5 compared to number of mega pixel it has This Camera should not go more than 6 Mega Pixel or use a bigger sensor 1/2.3 It will be a challenge Camera If Panasonic do it
customer_reviews.author: AL-Musafer

customer_reviews.title: Great zoom!
customer_reviews.text: Great zoom! Fits in my pocket easily which is just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: tallhall

customer_reviews.title: awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: for those who want a point and shoot camera with ease of use, this is the one. love it, zoom is great and usually in a low light room pictures are not good but with using no flash they are great, even tried some with flash and they were good also, love the camera
customer_reviews.author: CMR

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! I had one issued to me at work which worked very well. So, I liked it so much that I bought one for my private use! The wife loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Daron K

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, but...
customer_reviews.text: The digital images came out well but the LCK screen failed after 2 weeks. I'll tell you later how my customer service experience comes out...
customer_reviews.author: Ordinary Reader "Ron"

customer_reviews.title: I would advice every body to get this camra
customer_reviews.text: really not lik other cameras. It has nicest picture than others, also fantastic zoom exactly in the near objects or even very far objects. Other cameras have 3 to 4 optical zoom, but this has 12 optical zoom with no chang in the resolution.
customer_reviews.author: M. Altamimi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: I've very pleased with this camera. I haven't learned all the features yet, but the pictures I've taken are incredible. The images are clear, and the colors are bright. The zoom feature is very easy to use, and the close up pictures are sharp.
customer_reviews.author: L. Maxey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for travel
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this camera for a 3 month excursion through europe. 10 days in and I love the camera. It is easy to use and the wide angle is great. Also, the battery life is fantastic. I can get through a good 300 pictures before having to recharge.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: New Lumix Camera Carries on Tradition
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Lumix camera from Amazon. The original DMC-TZ3 had the 10x zoom in compact package, 28 mm wide angle, panoramic pictures, and DVD quality video. My new DMC-ZS1 goes a step further with 12x zoom and 25 mm wide angle. Otherwise its the same camera but at a new lower price point. The controls have been simplified for easier use. Great product, great delivery.
customer_reviews.author: D. W. Bondurant

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Needed a camera that we could take on the fly without lugging around the Canon with all the accessories. This camera was recommended by a photographer friend that carries this camera on the go. Nothing but good things to say.
customer_reviews.author: Engineer

customer_reviews.title: good price with quality pictures
customer_reviews.text: i bought it 3 years ago... it take quality pictures, and OK for night scene. light and easy to carry around, worth for the price
customer_reviews.author: Wei Long

customer_reviews.title: super wide
customer_reviews.text: BEAUTIFUL PICTURES....I HAVE USED CANONS FOR YEARS ,BUT THE 25MM LENS IS A WINNER...GOOD EXPOSURES....ONLY COMPLAINT IS THE COMMAND DIAL SPINS LIKE A TOP,WAY TOO LOOSE.....
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Zappala

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it for quite a while now and it does everything I want it to. Great pictures. Great options.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: lumixDMC-ZS1
customer_reviews.text: The Lumix DMC-ZS1 10 MP is a great digital camera, I just love it.I like the LEICA lens a lot, the pictures quality is GREAT .I like the feel of the cameras body ,it fits in my hand fine ,the Price is very good. Good job LEICA and Panasonic.
customer_reviews.author: P. varga

customer_reviews.title: The best there is out there
customer_reviews.text: This camera i purchased as a gift for my daughter. I have used the older versin for the last 2 years and i would not switch. The lens, the picture the use is absolutely the best.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Kyburz

customer_reviews.title: Great new Camera
customer_reviews.text: A friend had this camera and had taken great pictures on her last trip to Africa. The quality and sharpness of each picture was superb. I bought with the same expectations and have not been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. exactly as described. zoom is incredible and pictures are perfect. easy to use and understand. my daughter loves it. [she's 15]
customer_reviews.author: Katinmichigan

customer_reviews.title: Great Image quality!
customer_reviews.text: I have had several compact digital cameras in the past decade. This one has the best image quality and the best lens I have experienced so far, while being the cheapest that I bought.
customer_reviews.author: FrancescoG

customer_reviews.title: Lumix DMC-ZS1 one of the best point and shoot cameras
customer_reviews.text: The quality picture you get by just aiming and pushing the button in any situation can't be beat. And a note about Amazon. They have the internet business down pat: Order with a click or two, its sent out very fast and it's in your hands within a few days and in top condition. Thumbs up for Amazon and the Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS1 10MP Digital Camera. (I liked it so much that I gave it to a friend and went up a step and bought the Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS7 12MP Digital Camera.)
customer_reviews.author: silverbearbill

customer_reviews.title: The person for whom I purchased this likes it very muchThe
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift and the person for whom it was purchased tells me it is perfect and every easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Terry G. Werntz

customer_reviews.title: Great All Around Camera.
customer_reviews.text: Standard point and click cameras do not provide the picture quality of this camera...in my opinion. Only differene is that this point/click is a bit larger than the standard point/clicks...but worth the size when it comes to quickness and quality. Appears that the smaller the camera, the slower as well. I am happy with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: Great family camera
customer_reviews.text: We had tried 3 other camera's in a cheaper price range but all had broken within a month. This camera is definately worth the extra money. We've had very clear photos and the zoom is great.
customer_reviews.author: Hoppie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: GREAT CAMERA; but I still want one that also has a see-thru viewfinder.
customer_reviews.author: ERNEST E. SCHLATTER

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my daughter's birthday. She loves it. The zooom is wonderful and the pictures are awesome. It has alot of cool features. Great camera!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki S

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: this camera takes fantastic pictures - it has an amazing lens for one so small.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph M. Kaywin

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I spent many hours looking for the perfect camera for my needs. This one suits all aspects. It takes great pictures and is quite affordable. Everything I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Anita M. Sulzer

customer_reviews.title: Sony is Better
customer_reviews.text: This was one of my few departures from the Sony Cybershot line. It worked great for a bit, but then quickly became a worthless brick. By comparison, our Cybershots, Elfs, etc., from Sony have survived many, many adventures around the globe, including an amphibious landing operation with Russian Marines onto the coast of Poland.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Durish

customer_reviews.title: An excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera offers excellent image quality. The 12x zoom was an especially big plus. For it's price it's probably one of the most feature-rich cameras around.
customer_reviews.author: Anurag Singh

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: A good basic camera that requires little brainpower. Just takes good pictures easily. What more do you want?
customer_reviews.author: Martharoo

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, portability, worth paying for
customer_reviews.text: Lumex has a good len as everyone already knows. Good combination in terms of functionality, price and quality
customer_reviews.author: Jurerat Kongkiattiwong

customer_reviews.title: Candid Feedback
customer_reviews.text: After a lot of research and reviewing many of the comments from previous users we purchased this camera for our vacation. Unfortunately, we were really disappointed with the indoor picture quality - they were often very dark with the subjects appearing dark in the iA mode and scene mode. We eventually ended up buying a Canon Powershot during the vacation with a much better indoor and also great outdoor pictures even though it has fewer features.
customer_reviews.author: V. Jain

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product, my third Panasonic camera. It had an optical defect from the start, so I returned it under the warrantee. I didn't think it would be a big deal. I have now been arguing with Panasonic for over a month. They are willing to replace it only with a refurbished/used model, whose history is unknown -- and which of course I could have bought for much less than the brand new one I did buy. They refuse to budge, and are entirely unhelpful. So if you want a new camera, pick another brand!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Not well constructed
customer_reviews.text: The camera functioned well, but it fell off my keyboard on to the plastic chair mat on a carpeted floor. Sadly the digital screen broke and could not be returned because it was dropped. I was shocked it broke so easily. It was a 2 ft fall, but must have hit just right. If you buy it be very careful with it.
customer_reviews.author: Skyview Jack

customer_reviews.title: useless w/o charger
customer_reviews.text: The product I received was poorly packaged and there was no charger. Without the charger you could not use the camera. I would never buy from this company again and I would think twice about ordering from amazon. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: bfitia

customer_reviews.title: battery doesn't last a day without charging.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this camera but the battery goes down very quickly. It doesn't last a day. I've searched for replacement batteries and they are very pricy. I think my battery should be replaced by Amazon, LLC. Debbie Baird
customer_reviews.author: Debbie R. Baird

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The camera is fast and images are clear. Very few images are blurry (my fault).
customer_reviews.author: M. Eggleston

customer_reviews.title: 10X OPticAL ZoOM
customer_reviews.text: It is a good camera if you need good optical zoom in a compact size
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Lumix DNC-ZS1
customer_reviews.text: We were very disappointed in this camera. It has a myriad of complicated instructions - the writing is not at all user-friendly. Also, since I have a Mac and not a PC, the software for the downloaded photos doesn't work properly. The quality of the photos on iPhoto is mediocre. They were muddy and dark, even though the shots were taken on the automatic setting with the flash on. Maybe we don't know how to use it correctly, but you almost need an enginerring degree to understand this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Golfing queen

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have gotten an ELPH
customer_reviews.text: I have always been happy with the Cannon ElPH, not quite sure why I decided to change, but I feel like I am using a camera from the stone age. Even liked my Sony camera better. And very clunky. Bad decision
customer_reviews.author: onawhim

customer_reviews.title: Paid for Never Delivered!!!.
customer_reviews.text: The camera has not arrived. We have called several times and have been told it is coming. The last time we called they said they have no idea if they will ever be able to obtain the camera and send to us. The cameria was ordered on Amazon.com, paid for more than 1 month ago. Pretty shoddy!! The producet is Panasonic Lumix DMC=ZSI 10MP Digital Camera. The company that has our $'s but has no idea when they can send the camera is Electronics Expo, 70 Demarest Drive, Wayne, NJ 07470
customer_reviews.author: Emily C. Swartz

customer_reviews.title: NOT available
customer_reviews.text: This product was "not available" and the company sent me an email after the purchase from Amazon.com. The excuse was they were out of the item (camera) and not expected to get any more. My suspicions are that they advertised a great price just for marketing purposes and had no intention of actually selling the item for the quoted price. Shame on you Panasonic!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Balvin

product_meta.title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS1 10MP Digital Camera with 12x Wide Angle MEGA Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 2.7 inch LCD (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackFROM THE MANUFACTURER


The Panasonic DMC-ZS1 is a members of the new ZS-Series, the successor to the acclaimed LUMIX TZ-Series and one of Panasonic’s newest ultimate compact and powerful digital cameras. The ZS1 features a 25mm ultra-wide angle, 12x powerful optical zoom, plus a 10.1-megapixel CCD, a standard iA mode (no Face Recognition) for still image recording and a 2.7-inch, 230,000-dot Intelligent LCD. 

New this year to the ZS-Series, iA mode is also available in Movie Mode. It automatically selects the most suitable Scene mode and helps to correct handshake, focus and brightness problems - making iA mode your one-stop solution to capture beautiful still and motion images. Face Detection automatically detects a face in the frame and adjusts focus, exposure, contrast, and skin complexion so it turns out perfectly. Intelligent Exposure continually checks the ambient light level and adjusts the exposure setting as conditions change to prevent blown highlights and blocked shadows. And Intelligent Scene Selector automatically switches between Normal, Portrait, Macro, Scenery, and Low Light modes according to the situation to optimize visual quality. 

The imaging power of Lumix has further evolved with the Venus Engine HD, which boasts two CPUs to provide approx. 2.4x processing capability and support for AVCHD Lite and HDMI output. It integrates all the advanced functions and camera operations with high performance and low-power consumption. In image processing, luminance noise and chromatic noise are reduced separately before and after signal processing. This is further refined by separating noise two-dimensionally into high-frequency and low-frequency noise. The circuits then effectively reduce only the low-frequency noise to minimize the unwanted noise and help produce beautiful, sharp still and motion images. 

Playback with the ZS1 is also easy. Simply insert the camera’s SD memory card into the VIERA HDTV’s Image Viewer SD card slot for a photo slideshow. Alternatively, connect the camera via an optional HDMI mini cable, the DMW-HDC2, to a VIERA Link-equipped Panasonic VIERA HDTV and use the television’s remote control to run mixed slideshows of photos and videos.
feature_bullets: 10.1-megapixel resolution captures enough detail for poster-size prints
12x MEGA optical image-stablilized zoom; 25mm ultra-wide-angle lens
Capture images to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
